statements: UPDATE gene_ontology_annotations SET gene_name = 'ABC' WHERE gene_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE genes SET gene_description = 'Updated gene description' WHERE gene_id = 1;

UPDATE annotations SET annotation_text = 'New annotation text', annotation_type = 'Modified type' WHERE annotation_id = 3;
